system.effect: If this warp creature takes damage, and does not deal damage or cause insanity to another creature by the end of its turn, it must make a WP Test, taking 1 damage for failiure, plus 1 per degree of failiure. If this would deal damage equal to or in excess of its wounds, it is banished back to the warp.
